content: keito s jeans doll clothes may 13 2021 this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size height 37cm to tip of the toe bust 18cm waist 13cm hips 18cm foot 3 5cm please refer to my blog post for this pattern keito s jeans my blog about me… my english isn t perfect so you may not understand the text when you knit my pattern at that time please refer to the photo guide in my blog i hope you enjoy my pattern knit doll keito my blog 1 / 6 ©2021 nioknits keito s jeans doll clothes may 13 2021 materials ◇yarn soft merino fingering/ pierrot yarns japan 100%merino wool gauge 27stitches 37row/10cm 2 7~3 3mm needle my gauge stocking stitch 7 0stitches 9 0rows/ 2 5cm 3 0mm needle amount of yarn i actually used 10g/42m adjust the size of the needle as needed to get the above gauge needles ◇3 0mm needle cast on ◇4 0mm needle bind off ◇2 75mm dpns ◇3 0mm dpns others ◇stitch marker ◇tapestry needle ◇scissors ◇scrap yarn method longtail cast on forward loop cast on abbreviations pm - place marker k - knit p - purl ktbl - knit through the back loop m1l - make one left m1r - make one right sl1p - slip one purlwise sl1k - slip one knitwise k2tog - knit 2 stitches together ssk - slip slip knit 2 / 6 ©2021 nioknits keito s jeans doll clothes may 13 2021 pattern the process of making this pants begins from the waist and in the middle of the process the stitches are divided into the left leg and knitted toward the hem the design features of this pants are a fake belt loop on the waistband and a fake pocket on the butt using 3 0mm dpn longtail cast on 44sts leaving 10cm yarn tail and weave it into the stitch to finish round1 using 2 75mm dpns circular knitting from here distribute 44sts to 3dpns k1 p4 k2 3times p6 k2 p4 3times k1 pm the marker is in the center of the back body round2 ktbl k4 ktbl 2times 3times k6 ktbl 2times k4 3times ktbl round3 ktbl p4 ktbl 2times 3times p6 ktbl 2times p4 3times ktbl round4 same as round 2 round5 same as round 3 round6 k44 round7 change to 3 0mm dpns k17 m1l k10 m1r k17 round8 k46 round9 k17 m1l k12 m1r k17 round10 k48 round11 begin back pocket k3 p6 k8 m1l k14 m1r k8 p6 k3 round12 k3 p6 k8 k16 k8 p6 k3 round13 k3 p6 k8 m1l k16 m1r k8 p6 k3 round14 k3 p6 k8 k18 k8 p6 k3 round15 k3 p6 k34 p6 k3 round16 k3 p6 k34 p6 k3 round17 k3 p6 k34 p6 k3 round18 k3 p6 k34 p6 k3 round19 k3 sl1p yarn to front p4 yarn to back sl1p k34 sl1p yarn front p4 yarn to back sl1p k3
